de: A world blanketed in an endless and ever-growing ocean of snow. The people eke out a living, either huddled around the roots of enormous trees dotting the surface, or high in the canopy, which spreads over the planet's atmosphere.  A chance meeting between Kaina, a youth from the canopy, and Liliha, a young woman from the surface, sets off a chain of events that will change the fate of the world.
nm: Kaina of the Great Snow Sea: Star Sage
jp: Ooyukiumi no Kaina: Hoshi no Kenja
